entries: You've always had a green thumb, allowing you to care for plants that others found too difficult to grow and tend with a skill that borders on the magical. As you travel, you encounter all sorts of new plants and plant creatures, allowing you to expand your horizons and deepen your understanding of flora.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Wisdom or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in {@skill Nature} and {@skill Lore||Plant Lore}. You gain the {@feat Natural Medicine} skill feat.
